# Ghosts of Akavir - A Boss mod
- Author: ENR
- Game: skyrimspecialedition
- Mod Page: https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/mods/61171


﻿![](data:image/png;base64,)
  
  
﻿[size=4][size=4]**﻿Taira Matsutoshi**﻿[size=4]Location: Karthspire
  
[/size]﻿Backstory: The last surviving general of the old Dragonguard lineage.[/size]
  
He truly has seen better days.[/size]
  
![](https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/1704/images/60266/60266-1640499461-705977382.png)﻿[size=4]**﻿Agyo, The Giant**﻿[size=4]Location: Bloated Man's Grotto
  
[/size]﻿Backstory: This mysterious Giant guards the grave of his fallen companion. He
  
wields the ghostly sword Makoto, a massive blade originally wielded by
  
an Akaviri Demon.[/size]![](https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/1704/images/60266/60266-1640499385-1893401560.png)**Dragonguard Priestess, Akamizu**[size=4][size=4]﻿Location: The Karthspire
  
﻿Backstory: The final line of defense of the old Dragonguard. Her ghostly blue halberd
  
is actually a Staff used to cast sorceries, yet Priestess Akamizu
  
favoured physical combat over the magical arts, causing her to
  
will the blade into existance.[/size][/size]
  
![](https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/1704/images/60266/60266-1640499558-1145618834.png)﻿**Spirit Of Wrath**[size=4][size=4]﻿Location: Sky Haven Temple, within the Memory of Reman Cyrodiil
  
﻿Backstory: The manifestation of the demon which dwelt inside the mind of Reman Cyrodiil.[/size][/size]
  
![](https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/1704/images/60266/60266-1640499350-293861022.png)﻿
  
[size=5]**[color=#e06666][size=6]DO NOT USE WITH "HIDDEN BLADES"
  
Choose one or the** [other.](https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/mods/60266?tab=description)﻿
  
[/size][/color][![](https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/1704/images/60266/60266-1640717130-271767210.png)](https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/mods/60266?tab=description)﻿﻿
  
![](data:image/png;base64,)

[/size]
  
[size=3]Racemenu Sliders - [Expressive Facegen Morphs](https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/mods/35785)﻿
  
Hairs - [KS Hairdos](https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/mods/6817), ﻿HG Hairdos on LL, Apachii Sky Hair[/size]
